title: Flower Demon’s Inn - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Cultivation   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Helpful Protagonist   Immortals   Mythology   Spirits   Strong Love Interests
author: Yi Mei Tong Qian   一枚铜钱
description:
As a flower demon with three hundred years of cultivation, Shao Zi’s biggest wish is to beat up that egghead Scholar (shu sheng) that always comes to water plants at noon.

But when she got close and rubs her hands in preparation for action, she realizes that she’s clearly playing along to someone’s rhythm ah!>
